trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de desenhos que pode ser operada como um único desenho.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> para combinar vários desenhos em um único, composto desenho.

trans-unit.source: Unlike other <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, you can apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> setting, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, or a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de outras <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objetos, você pode aplicar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> configuração, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A>, ou um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes.
trans-unit.target: A flexibilidade dessa classe permite que você crie cenas complexas.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is also a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, it can contain other <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> também é um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>, ele pode conter outros <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objetos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objetos, consulte [visão geral de objetos de desenho](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Recursos de Freezable:** porque ele herda do <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> classe, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> classe fornece vários recursos especiais: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objetos podem ser declarados como, compartilhados entre vários objetos, feitos somente leitura para melhorar desempenho, clonados e tornados thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os diferentes recursos fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos, consulte [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Opens the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> in order to populate its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" />.
trans-unit.target: Abre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> para popular seu <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" />.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to append additional <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que você acrescente <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" /> adicionais a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> that you can use to describe the contents of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> que você pode usar para descrever o conteúdo desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> before you can render this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve fechar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> antes de você pode renderizar isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect" /> to apply to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect" /> a ser aplicado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect" /> to apply to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect" /> a ser aplicado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os efeitos de bitmap e como eles funcionam, consulte [visão geral de efeitos de Bitmap](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> as operações são aplicadas na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> to a drawing.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como aplicar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> a um desenho.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> to blur or emboss, or to apply other visual effects to rendered content.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> desfoque ou alto-relevo ou aplicar outros efeitos visuais ao conteúdo renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objects support bitmap effects.
trans-unit.target: Somente <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objetos oferecem suporte para efeitos de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: To apply a bitmap effect to another type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> and set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar um efeito de bitmap em outro tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> de objeto, adicione-o a um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Windows Presentation Foundation bitmap effects are software rendered.
trans-unit.target: Efeitos de bitmap do Windows Presentation Foundation são renderizados por software.

trans-unit.source: Any object that applies a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> is also rendered in the software.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto que aplica um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> também é renderizado no software.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> in large visuals or animations because this scenario can cause a decrease in system performance.
trans-unit.target: Evite usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> em grandes animações ou visuais porque este cenário pode causar uma diminuição no desempenho do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect> to several <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> para aplicar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect> para vários <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the output from this example.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra a saída deste exemplo.

trans-unit.source: ![DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect")
trans-unit.target: ![DrawingGroup com um BlurBitmapEffect](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "DrawingGroup com um BlurBitmapEffect")

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the region where the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> applies its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> and, optionally, a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> to use as input for its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a região em que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> aplica seu <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> e, opcionalmente, um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> para usar como entrada para seu <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" />.

trans-unit.source: The region where the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> is applied and, optionally, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> to use as input; or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> applies to the whole <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> and uses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> as its input.
trans-unit.target: A região onde o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> é aplicada e, opcionalmente, o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> para usar como entrada; ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> se aplica a todo o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> e usa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> como sua entrada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffectInput" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffectInput" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.BitmapEffect" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> objects that are contained in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> contidos neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> objects in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção dos objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection" /> vazio.

trans-unit.source: The z-order of the child items in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is determined by the order of the child items in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: A ordem z dos itens filho em uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> é determinada pela ordem os itens filhos a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingCollection> do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Cada filho de desenho está sob o próximo filho na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the clip region of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a região de corte desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> that is used to clip this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> que é usado para recortar esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Desenhos fora da geometria serão recortados do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> quando ele for renderizado.

trans-unit.source: The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> to clip to an elliptical shape.
trans-unit.target: A geometria não precisa ser retangular; Por exemplo, você pode usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry> para recortar para uma forma elíptica.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> as operações são aplicadas na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to define a clip region for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como definir uma região de clip para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> to define a clip for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> para definir um clipe para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> class is the only type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object that enables you to define your own clip region.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> classe é o único tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objeto que permite que você defina sua própria região de recorte.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to describe the clip and apply it to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> para descrever o corte e aplicá-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> before and after the elliptical clip is applied.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração mostra a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> antes e após o corte elíptico é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: ![DrawingGroup with a defined clip region](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "DrawingGroup with a defined clip region")
trans-unit.target: ![DrawingGroup com uma região de clip definida](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "DrawingGroup com uma região de clip definida")

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> to several <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> para aplicar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry%2A> para vários <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.ClipGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> and makes deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda modificável deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> e faz cópias profundas de seus valores.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property of the cloned object returns <see langword="false" /> even if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property of the source is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado retorna <see langword="false" /> mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem é <see langword="true." />

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para produzir cópias modificáveis de somente leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse método copia as propriedades de dependência, ele copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso, embora eles não podem resolver.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ele não copie animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> object and makes deep copies of its current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda modificável deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> e faz cópias profundas de seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property of the cloned object is <see langword="false" /> even if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property of the source is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado é <see langword="false" /> mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para produzir cópias modificáveis de somente leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Este método não copia referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações, embora ele copie os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet" /> to apply to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet" /> a ser aplicado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet" /> to apply to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GuidelineSet" /> a ser aplicado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is applied after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> deste <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> é aplicada após o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A>.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> is transformed along with the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet%2A> é transformado junto com o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.GuidelineSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a opacidade deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0 e 1, inclusive, que descreve a opacidade deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <c>1</c>.

trans-unit.source: A value of `1` specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de `1` Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> é completamente opaco; um valor de `0` Especifica que é completamente transparente.

trans-unit.source: A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que seja menor do que 0 é tratado como 0 e um valor maior que 1 é tratado como 1.

trans-unit.source: Another way to control the opacity of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> is to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Outra maneira de controlar a opacidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> é especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush.Opacity%2A> de seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> as operações são aplicadas na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to modify the opacity of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como modificar a opacidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> class is the only type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object that has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> classe é o único tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objeto que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To change the opacity of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> and set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a opacidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> de objeto, adicione-o a um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> setting of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object is multiplied by the opacity of its child drawings; for example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> of 0.5 and it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> that has a 50 percent opaque <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush%2A>, the brush is 25 percent opaque (0.5 * 0.5).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> configuração do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto é multiplicado pela opacidade de seus desenhos-filhos; por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> de 0,5 e ele contém um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> que tem um 50 por cento opaco <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush%2A>, o pincel é 25 por cento opaco (0,5 * 0,5).

trans-unit.source: To alter the opacity of select portions of a drawing, use an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a opacidade de partes específicas de um desenho, use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> to combine several <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> para combinar vários <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object to 0.25 so that the drawings are 25 percent opaque.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também define a opacidade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> do objeto de 0,25 para que os desenhos sejam 25 por cento opaco.

trans-unit.source: This illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> before and after its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> is set to 0.25.
trans-unit.target: Esta ilustração mostra o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> antes e após seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> seja definida como 0,25.

trans-unit.source: ![DrawingGroups with different opacity settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "DrawingGroups with different opacity settings")
trans-unit.target: ![DrawingGroups com diferentes configurações de opacidade](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "DrawingGroups com diferentes configurações de opacidade")

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o pincel usado para alterar a opacidade de regiões selecionados deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that describes the opacity of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />; <see langword="null" /> indicates that no opacity mask exists and the opacity is uniform.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> que descreve a opacidade desta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />; <see langword="null" /> indica que nenhuma máscara de opacidade existe e a opacidade é uniforme.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is mapped to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> é mapeado para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de opacidade de cada pixel do mapeado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> é usado para determinar a opacidade resultante de cada pixel correspondente do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Somente o valor de opacidade de cada cor do pincel é usado para esse processamento; todas as outras informações de cor são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: A opacidade que essa propriedade especifica é multiplicada com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity%2A> valor o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre máscaras de opacidade e como eles funcionam, consulte [visão geral de máscaras de opacidade](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> as operações são aplicadas na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to apply an opacity mask to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como aplicar uma máscara de opacidade para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> class is the only type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object that supports opacity masks.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> classe é o único tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objeto que suporta máscara de opacidade.

trans-unit.source: To apply an opacity mask to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> and set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar uma máscara de opacidade a um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> de objeto, adicione-o a um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows three views of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>: the drawing without an opacity mask, the opacity mask alone, and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> after the opacity mask is applied.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra três modos de exibição da <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>: o desenho sem uma máscara de opacidade, a máscara de opacidade sozinha e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> depois que a máscara de opacidade é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: ![A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask")
trans-unit.target: ![Um DrawingGroup com uma máscara de opacidade](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "um DrawingGroup com uma máscara de opacidade")

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> as an opacity mask for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> como uma máscara de opacidade para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>.

trans-unit.source: Although this example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> as an opacity mask, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> objects can also make good opacity masks.
trans-unit.target: Embora este exemplo usa um <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> como uma máscara de opacidade, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> também podem ser boas máscaras de opacidade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see the [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre máscaras de opacidade e como eles funcionam, consulte o [visão geral de máscaras de opacidade](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.OpacityMask" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Opacity" />.

trans-unit.source: Opens the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> in order to populate its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" /> and clears any existing <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" />.
trans-unit.target: Abre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> para popular seu <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" /> e limpa todos os <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Children" /> existentes.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> that can be used to describe the contents of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> que pode ser usado para descrever o conteúdo desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: You must close the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> before you can render this <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Você deve fechar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> antes de você pode renderizar isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> that is applied to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Transform" /> aplicado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: A transformação a ser aplicada a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: To apply multiple transforms to a single <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar várias transformações a um único <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> operations are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> as operações são aplicadas na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como aplicar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing>.

trans-unit.source: To transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object, you add it to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> and set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Para transformar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> do objeto, adicioná-lo para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> class is the only type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> object that supports transforms.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> classe é o único tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Drawing> objeto que oferece suporte a transformações.

trans-unit.source: To apply multiple transforms to a single <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar várias transformações a um único <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.TransformGroup>.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> to combine several <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objects and then transforms them by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> para combinar vários <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> objetos e, em seguida, transforma-os usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>.

trans-unit.source: The illustration shows the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> before and after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> is applied.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração mostra a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> antes e depois o <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: ![A rotated DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "A rotated DrawingGroup")
trans-unit.target: ![A rotação DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "um girado DrawingGroup")

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup.Transform" />.
